Sarah received $30 from her grandmother for her birthday.
Excited, she began planning on how to use it. 

She knew she needed a new school bag, which would cost $20. Sarah also fancied a charm bracelet for $10. Every month, her mom gave her $10 to spend. This month, Sarah considered buying a book for $8. Plus, in two months, she planned to buy a special gift for her best friend's birthday that would cost around $15.
